alert.note: Alert for Black Mesa Area; Chinle Valley; Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau; Eastern Mogollon Rim; Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County; Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas Hwy 264 Northward; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas South of Hwy 264; Western Mogollon Rim (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 18 at 8:58PM MST until April 19 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM MST /9 AM MDT/ TO 8 PM MST /9 PM MDT/ WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest to west winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Eastern Coconino, Navajo and Apache Counties including the Little Colorado River Valley and the Mogollon Rim. This includes Flagstaff, Williams, Tuba City, Munds Park and Snowflake. * WHEN...From 8 AM MST /9 AM MDT/ to 8 PM MST /9 PM MDT/ Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. In addition, winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Patchy blowing dust will develop with localized reduced visibility, mainly over the lower elevation areas north of the Mogollon Rim.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
